Exploring Data Validation With The pointblank Package

Data validation is a very important component that should not be ignored when working in data analytics or data science. While there are many ways to perform data validation in R, this talk will explore Rich Iannone and Mauricio Vargas’ pointblank package for this purpose.

Cleveland R User Group
